text: (nālku) pavitra tiṅgaḷugaḷu mugidāga, ā bahudēvārādhakarannu kaṇḍalli kolliri, avarannu hiḍiyiri, suttuvariyiri mattu pratiyondu āyakaṭṭina sthaḷadalli avarigāgi hon̄cinalliri. Taruvāya, avaru paścāttāpa paṭṭare, namājh‌annu pālisuvavarādare mattu jhakāt‌annu pāvatisidare, avarige avara dāriyannu biṭṭu koḍiri. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanu kṣamisuvavanu mattu karuṇāmayiyāgiddāne
